Text: Radford (band):  Two songs from this album found their way onto major soundtracks - "Fall At Your Feet" on the soundtrack for "Teaching Mrs. Tingle", and "Stay" on the soundtracks for "Clubland", "Scary Movie", and "Never Been Kissed".
